sentences.en: Berlin people drank champagne, set off fireworks and tooted their car horns.
sentences.cn: 柏林市民喝香槟、放焰火、鸣车笛。

sentences.en: children with expectant faces waiting for the fireworks to begin
sentences.cn: 带着期盼的神情等待烟火表演的孩子们

sentences.en: Fireworks added to the attraction of the festival night.
sentences.cn: 烟火使节日之夜更加生辉.

sentences.en: Fireworks shows are popular around the world. But if I do not end this program right now, there will be fireworks from my producer.
sentences.cn: 烟火盛会在全世界都受欢迎，但如果我不马上结束这期节目的话，我的制作人就要发火了。

sentences.en: It is given a typically thoughtful production with just enough theatrical fireworks.
sentences.cn: 该剧在制作上一如既往地花费了心思，舞台演出效果也相当精彩。

sentences.en: On the stroke of 12, fireworks suddenly exploded into the night.
sentences.cn: 12点的钟声刚敲响，焰火便在夜空中绽放。

sentences.en: People set off fireworks and tooted their car horns.
sentences.cn: 人们点燃烟花，按响汽车喇叭。

sentences.en: The children are setting fireworks off in the garden.
sentences.cn: 孩子们在花园里燃放烟火.

sentences.en: The evening ended with a dramatic display of fireworks.
sentences.cn: 晚会以五彩斑斓的焰火表演结束。

sentences.en: The evening ended with a grand finale of fireworks and music.
sentences.cn: 晚会在烟花和音乐声中隆重收场了.

sentences.en: The most pleasurable experience of the evening was the wonderful fireworks display.
sentences.cn: 这个晚上最让人高兴的就是精彩的焰火表演。

sentences.en: The night skies will be aglow with fireworks.
The team came out to the accompaniment of fireworks.
sentences.cn: 在烟花的映照下，队伍出场了。

sentences.en: The whole city will celebrate the New Year with fireworks.
sentences.cn: 今年过年,全城都将放焰火.

sentences.en: to let off a few fireworks
Two of the fireworks in the box were duds.
sentences.cn: 盒子里的烟火有两个是点不着的废品。

sentences.en: What else ___ you ___(do)? –I ____(watch)the fireworks and dragon dances in.
sentences.cn: 你还做了什么？-我在街上观看了烟花和舞龙。

phrases.tran_cn: 烟花汇演，烟火表演；施放烟火

trans.tran_cn: 烟火表演，精彩难忘的演出（或作品）
trans.tran_en: a show in which large numbers of fireworks are let off simultaneously
